Descriptions.AND: Logical AND: result is true if both values are true
Descriptions.OR: Logical OR: result is true if at least one value is true
Descriptions.NOT: Logical NOT: inverts the value (true becomes false)
Descriptions.NOR: Logical NOR: result is true if both values are false
Descriptions.XOR: Exclusive OR: result is true if only one of the values is true
Descriptions.XNOR: Logical XNOR: result is true if both values are the same
